column4: I think if you were to delete the interface and then re-add it as a wireless device, then you could change those settings
Yeah, my guess is that if I remove and re-add it in network settings that'd do it.  I was a bit afraid of messing something up, but I'll try it.  brb.
You were right.  Removed my NIC entry in Network Settings and added it as a wireless card and all the options appeared.  I still wonder why it setup that way by default, though.
it did the same thing to me
